Name: BrainLoom
Tagline: Turn PDFs into Flashcards. The local-first Learning OS.
Description: Stop switching between different apps just to study. BrainLoom is the local-first Learning OS that unifies your study workflow. Turn PDF highlights into Flashcards instantly and keep them linked to the source text for deep context. You can also structure ideas visually on an Infinite Canvas using "Smart Paste" without touching your mouse. Available for Windows v1.0 (Mac soon). To fund the expansion, grab a Lifetime License for $29 today (First 150 users only).

Name: Youtube Custom Playback
Tagline: Unlock up to 16x speed with native-style controls
Description: This lightweight extension adds granular playback speeds from 0.25x to 16x directly into your native settings menu. Perfect for power-learners who need to watch lots of lectures or analysts who need frame-by-frame precision.

Name: Humans in the Loop
Tagline: A free community to talk all-things-agentic-coding-AI
Description: Humans in the Loop is a place for people who love to use AI to ship faster, a free community to join and share insights and best practices on Claude Code, Cursor, MCP servers, AI code reviews, and more.

Name: Sometimes: A Poem Arrives
Tagline: Poetry at Unexpected Moments
Description: The best things arrive when you're not looking. Discover poetry that matches your moment, when you least expect it. The app considers time of day, weather, and season. A poetry app for iOS.

Name: GetThis
Tagline: Generate tasks from voice, text, or screenshots.
Description: Stop typing. Just speak or snap a screenshot of your chats. GetThis uses AI to sort your brain dump, organize grocery runs, and categorize tasks instantly.

Name: np
Tagline: Ask questions, build forms and make predictions.
Description: Fed up of bots and rage bait? Longing for human content? Look no fur.. seriously, 100% human network - no bots, bait or slop. You can write on your friend's wall, ask communities or make "I told you so" predictions about pretty much anything.

Name: Meal Planner
Tagline: Embrace Healthy Lifestyle
Description: Embrace Healthy Lifestyle Are you struggling to stick with your diet? Planning to eat healthy, but can't start? Counting calories in your head won't work long term. That's why I created this template. Less uncertainty and chaos, more clarity and progress. Whether you want to simply track what you eat, stick to your diet or you have a certain weight goal or health goal. This template is made for you. Are you ready to build healthy habits?

Name: Contractso
Tagline: The Modern Standard for E-Signatures.
Description: Contractso is a next-gen e-signature platform built for speed and legal security. It transforms static files into interactive contracts where you can embed checkboxes and radio groups to collect data while signing. Every document is backed by a bank-grade audit trail and SMS 2FA for total compliance. Build client trust by white-labeling the interface with your branding, and ensure authenticity with our cryptographic QR verification system. Close deals faster with a workflow designed for growth.

Name: BananaX
Tagline: üçåAI-powered infographic generator for X posts
Topics: Chrome Extensions, Social Media, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: BananaX transforms your X (Twitter) posts into stunning infographic images with one click using Google's Gemini AI. üé® KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ One-click infographic generation from post text ‚Ä¢ Customizable prompt patterns for different styles ‚Ä¢ Multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 16:9, etc.) ‚Ä¢ Multi-language UI (English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese) üí° WHY BANANAX? Visual content gets 3x more engagement on social media. BananaX makes creating eye-catching graphics effortless.

Name: PainPoints.fast
Tagline: Validate Your SaaS Idea with Real Pain Points
Description: PainPoints.fast helps founders validate SaaS ideas using real customer complaints. Enter an idea and the platform analyzes real conversations across Reddit, X, G2, and other public sources to surface recurring pain points, urgency, and willingness to pay. Each report includes clear scores, real quotes, competitor signals, and a simple verdict: Build, Consider, or Skip. Built for founders who want evidence before committing months of work.

Name: HSM Visa Sponsor Checker ‚Äî LinkedIn
Tagline: Check if Dutch companies are HSM visa sponsors on LinkedIn
Description: Job hunting in the Netherlands as an international? This Chrome extension instantly shows whether a LinkedIn company is a recognized Highly Skilled Migrant visa sponsor. It adds clear badges to Dutch job listings using data from the official IND registry, so you can apply with more confidence. Always double-check on the IND website.

Name: MatchProlly - Live Resume
Tagline: A live resume that updates as fast as you do
Description: Live Resume is a single, shareable resume link that updates in real time as your skills and experience change. No outdated PDFs or multiple versions. - One live profile link - Real-time updates - Audio elevator pitch for human context - ATS-friendly live PDF from the same link - Early Adopter badge for early users Free during early access. Jobs coming soon.

Name: Pastable Signature
Tagline: Scans of signatures to sigs with transparent backgrounds.
Description: Extract clean signatures from scanned documents and images. Upload, precisely crop the signature, remove the background, and get a professional result fast.

Name: Rivva - AI Baby Tracking App
Tagline: For new and future parents, a better way to care together.
Description: Most baby apps start as trackers and add guidance later. Rivva is built the other way around: it starts with the question every new parent asks at 3 a.m. ‚Äì ‚Äúis this normal?‚Äù ‚Äì and everything else serves that. Every log of poop, sleep, or feeds rolls up into a simple, per‚Äëbaby view that answers: does this look typical for my baby? Is something worth taking a closer look?

Name: FreeToolsfr
Tagline: Free Online PDF, Image & QR Code Tools
Description: Free online tools for PDF editing, image conversion, QR code generation, and text processing. All processing happens in your browser - 100% private and secure. No signup required.

Name: Somain Magic
Tagline: Doodle freely. Make it a masterpiece.
Description: Somain Magic turns doodles into beautiful AI art in seconds. Ôøº Draw anything on a simple canvas (finger or Apple Pencil), choose a style, and tap the magic button‚Äîyour sketch becomes pixel art, watercolor, anime, cartoon, and more. Ôøº Built for kids, families, and anyone who wants instant creative joy: no art skills needed, no account required, and you can save & share your creations. Ôøº Includes 16 styles and free daily credits so you can keep creating every day. Ôøº

Name: IntegrateStack
Tagline: Diagnose and fix broken SaaS integrations instantly.
Description: Don't let a broken sync stop your revenue. IntegrateStack is a free diagnostic platform for 40+ top SaaS tools. Find step-by-step setup guides, troubleshooting flows for common errors, and automation workarounds for when native integrations fail.

Name: Owlvera SAT Prep
Tagline: The only SAT practice made by students for students
Description: Owlvera helps students master the SAT with daily practice questions, instant detailed explanations, and progress tracking. The best part about this product is the fact that all questions, answers, and explanations are custom-made by students who got over 1500 on the SAT. Studying is superpowered by an AI called Nester. Nester is fully trained on the answers and explanations to questions, so he will never be wrong. Explanations are expertly crafted to actually teach the concept to the student!

Name: Pixelora.art
Tagline: AI Powered Infinite Creative Canvas
Description: Pixelora is an infinite AI canvas for designers, marketers, and creators. Describe what you want and generate stunning visuals on a single, endless workspace. Pan, zoom, and grow scenes instead of juggling static, one-off images. Edit, remix, and branch ideas into storyboards and full campaigns, then export assets for social, ads, thumbnails, and clients in a few clicks. Built for the AI era so your entire creative workflow lives in one place.

Name: TaskNap - Desktop App
Tagline: Productivity Suite for Calm people, now Offline.
Description: You shouldn't need an internet connection for a Pomodoro app with note-taking. So now you can download the app and run it on Mac, Windows, and Linux without the need to be online.
